summary: Modlist, that included graphics, physics, and gameplay.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/PGHvHnQ.png[/img][/center][center][font=Georgia][i][size=4]OK, maybe someone will be interested.
A lot of great mods locates on Internet, combining that,
you can get a better picture than outside your rainy window.[/size]
[size=3][/size][/i][/font][/center][font=Arial][size=3]
Watching different videos on YouTube,
searching the entire Internet, I managed to achieve beautiful graphics and smooth Gameplay, without crashing.
Here you do not need any instruction, just install in order. Of the installers, personally I use NMM, but there is no much difference with other installers. You know your computer better, so I won't recommend a resolution. In the links and inside the installer, you can choose the appropriate settings.

[/size][/font][size=3]About my specs:[/size]
[size=2]-[b][color=#ff7700]OS[/color]:[/b] Windows 10 Pro x64
-[b][color=#ff7700]GPU[/color]:[/b] NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
-[b][color=#ff7700]Display[/color]:[/b] ASUS Generic PnP Monitor 16:10 (1440x900)
-[b][color=#ff7700]MB[/color]:[/b] [font=Arial]P8H61-M LX3 PLUS R2.0[/font]
-[b][color=#ff7700]CPU[/color]:[/b] IntelCore i5-3350P @ 3.10GHz
-[b][color=#ff7700]RAM[/color]:[/b] 8 GB
-[b][color=#ff7700]HDD[/color]:[/b] 1 TB

[/size]On medium quality in-Launcher[color=#ff7700];[/color] in-Game with all this mods +High or 2K resolution, my FPS[color=#ff7700]:[/color]
-[color=#ff7700]Interior[/color]: ~50
-[color=#ff7700]Exterior[/color]: ~30
For human's eye normal is ~24 FPS
